attributes.action: Stop the increase of petrol / diesel prices immediately and lower them back down to an acceptable level (below £1.00 per litre)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to put a fixed cost on the price of fuel and to ensure it stays at that price. The petition is also to bring the price of fuel back to an acceptable amount of under £1.00 per litre.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
